text: Broadway is a 1942 American crime drama movie directed by William A. Seiter and is the second version of the 1926 play of the same name. It stars George Raft, Pat O'Brien, Janet Blair, Broderick Crawford, Marjorie Rambeau, Anne Gwynne, Edward Brophy, Gus Schilling, Arthur Shields, Iris Adrian and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1942 crime movies Category:1942 drama movies Category:1940s American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by William A. Seiter Category:Movies set in New York City
title: Broadway (1942 movie)
